column4: hello my fellow Ubuntuers! I come from the future with great news.
let me guess, Windows still commands the vast majority of desktops? :)
Songbird is now 3.0 and has over taken iTunes, microsoft just hopped on the open source band wagon (you still have to pay though, and it sucks) and Ubuntu is the default OS!
yes, but they are open source now. talntid no, because geico ended in 2009 due to the market crash
